Name: Cyren-LogicApp-Ingestion
Author: Cyren - support@cyren.com
Description: The Cyren Logic App Ingestion solution uses Logic Apps with managed identity to poll Cyren's IP Reputation and Malware URLs feeds and ingest threat indicators into Microsoft Sentinel via the Logs Ingestion API. Includes analytics rules for detecting high-risk IPs, malware URLs, and persistent threats.
Analytic Rules: Analytic Rules/Cyren - High Risk IP Detection.yaml
